attachmentHtml:
PC Number: 2002-1908

Date: 2002-11-07

Sur recommandation du ministre de la Justice, le Comité du Conseil privé recommande que monsieur Yves-Marie Morissette, de la ville de Montréal dans la province de Québec, un avocat, soit nommé juge puîné de la Cour d'appel de ladite province.



The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Yves-Marie Morissette, Esquire, of the City of Montréal in the Province of Quebec, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Puisne Judge of the Court of Appeal of the said Province.

The Committee of the Privy Council, on the recommendation of the Minister of Justice, advise that Yves-Marie Morissette, Esquire, of the City of Montréal in the Province of Quebec, Barrister-at-law, be appointed a Puisne Judge of the Court of Appeal of the said Province.
